message: Post here if you want/are willing to volunteer on site for PyCon 2011 in Atlanta
Is this topic good enough? Listen for what's needed / where - right when it's needed?
I am willing to volunteer on site !
If you can set aside some time to help @ the conference, sign up for a time slot here: http://us.pycon.org/2011/volunteer/onsite/
Also, keep an eye on convore.com/pycon-2011 during the conference for calls for Volunteers needed!
We'll need help at startup - taping down powerstrips, getting the registration packages and badges prepared, so if you're in town Tues, Wed, Thurs - by all means, sign up for some time!
I can help on Tuesday and after the tutorials on Wed and Thur
Hopefully there will be sign or something. I've had trouble finding the right people or room in the past
I'll also be sure to have some "volunteer" checkin signs at appropriate places.
I'll be there nice and early so count me in!
Point taken - lacking anything else, go to the registration desk (where we'll be coordinating a good chunk of the volunteer work)
What's the earliest you need people? (Day and Time) I'm interested in helping.
@brianball Bag stuffing usually happens the night Thursday night in the main hall, so thats at least something with a known time :)
Actually,  we haven't posted yet, but Tuesday night either 6PM or 7PM we'll start.
Wednesday,  Thursday we'll have signups from 7AM to probably 6PM - but the biggest "social" part of it will be as tutorials let out, and we try to get people to join in for a while.
Don't forget to sign up as a volunteer:  http://us.pycon.org/2011/volunteer/onsite/signup/
While we need "just show up and see if you can help", letting us know when you are available helps - so sign up!
